comment: Lemma for ~ radcnvlt1 , ~ radcnvle . If ` X ` is a point closer to zero than ` Y ` and the power series converges at ` Y ` , then it converges absolutely at ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)
